zh-cn: 军事委员会别动忠义救国军

description.zh-cn: 由戴笠创办，隶属于国民政府军事委员会的一支战斗武装。其前身为苏浙行动委员会别働队，主要在敌后进行游击战，参与了中国抗日战争与第二次国共内战。曾接受中美合作所的训练与装备，战后改编为交通警察部队，并有分支参与了二二八事件后的清乡行动。
description.en: A combat force founded by Dai Li and affiliated with the Military Affairs Commission of the Nationalist Government. Its predecessor was the Commando Unit of the Suzhe Action Committee. It primarily engaged in guerrilla warfare behind enemy lines, participating in the Second Sino-Japanese War and the Second Chinese Civil War. It received training and equipment from the Sino-American Cooperative Organization (SACO), was reorganized into the Traffic Police Corps after the war, and some of its units participated in the rural pacification campaigns following the February 28 Incident.

description.zh-cn: 中国军事将领，国民政府军事委员会调查统计局（军统）负责人。他创办了苏浙行动委员会别働队及后来的忠义救国军，并长期担任其指挥官。
description.en: A Chinese military general and head of the Bureau of Investigation and Statistics (Juntong) of the Military Affairs Commission. He founded the Commando Unit of the Suzhe Action Committee and its successor, the Loyal and Righteous Army, and served as its commander for a long time.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治家和军事家，曾任国民政府主席和国民政府军事委员会委员长，下令组建忠义救国军的前身组织。
description.en: A Chinese politician and military leader who served as Chairman of the Nationalist Government and the Military Affairs Commission. He ordered the formation of the predecessor organization to the Loyal and Righteous Army.

description.zh-cn: 上海青帮头目，在忠义救国军前身苏浙行动委员会中担任主任委员，其领导的青帮势力是部队成员的重要来源。
description.en: Leader of the Green Gang in Shanghai. He served as the chairman of the Suzhe Action Committee, the predecessor of the Loyal and Righteous Army, and the Green Gang forces he led were a significant source of recruits for the unit.

description.zh-cn: 1937年淞沪战役后，由蒋中正下令在上海成立的组织，是忠义救国军的前身组织。
description.en: An organization established in Shanghai by order of Chiang Kai-shek after the 1937 Battle of Shanghai, serving as the predecessor to the Loyal and Righteous Army.

nodes.id: 苏浙行动委员会别働队

zh-cn: 苏浙行动委员会别働队

description.zh-cn: 由戴笠根据蒋中正命令，在苏浙行动委员会之下于1937年9月组建的游击武装，是忠义救国军的直接前身。
description.en: A guerrilla force established in September 1937 by Dai Li under the Suzhe Action Committee, based on orders from Chiang Kai-shek. It was the direct predecessor of the Loyal and Righteous Army.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国训政时期的中央政府与最高行政机关。
description.en: The central government and highest administrative body of the Republic of China during the period of political tutelage.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的创建政党，在训政时期为该国唯一的执政党。
description.en: The founding political party of the Republic of China, and the sole ruling party during the period of political tutelage.

description.zh-cn: 国民政府时期的最高军事指挥及统御机构，忠义救国军的直接上级单位。
description.en: The supreme military command and control body during the Nationalist Government period, and the direct superior of the Loyal and Righteous Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国抗日战争初期在上海及周边地区进行的一场大规模战役，其爆发直接促成了苏浙行动委员会的成立。
description.en: A large-scale battle fought in and around Shanghai during the early stages of the Second Sino-Japanese War. Its outbreak directly led to the establishment of the Suzhe Action Committee.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战期间，中华民国与美国合作成立的跨国情报及军事机构，曾负责训练忠义救国军并提供美式装备。
description.en: A transnational intelligence and military organization established by the Republic of China and the United States during World War II. It was responsible for training the Loyal and Righteous Army and providing American equipment.

description.zh-cn: 忠义救国军于1946年1月21日改编后的部队番号。
description.en: The military designation of the Loyal and Righteous Army after its reorganization on January 21, 1946.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党领导的新四军下属部队，曾与忠义救国军发生摩擦。
description.en: A unit under the command of the New Fourth Army, led by the Communist Party of China, which had frictions with the Loyal and Righteous Army.

description.zh-cn: 1947年发生于台湾的民众反抗政府事件及后续的军事镇压。事件后，忠义救国军别动队在台进行了清乡行动。
description.en: A popular uprising against the government in Taiwan in 1947, followed by military suppression. After the incident, commando units of the Loyal and Righteous Army carried out rural pacification campaigns in Taiwan.

nodes.id: 国民政府军事委员会调查统计局

zh-cn: 国民政府军事委员会调查统计局

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的情报机关，由戴笠长期负责。其后续机构保密局在二二八事件期间派遣人员在台组织忠义救国军别动队。
description.en: The intelligence agency of the Republic of China, long headed by Dai Li. Its successor, the Bureau of Investigation and Statistics (Secrecy Bureau), dispatched personnel to organize commando units of the Loyal and Righteous Army in Taiwan during the February 28 Incident.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，时任保密局（军统局的后续机构）局长，在二二八事件期间派遣刘戈青赴台。
description.en: A military general of the Republic of China and the director of the Secrecy Bureau (successor to Juntong) at the time. He dispatched Liu Geqing to Taiwan during the February 28 Incident.

description.zh-cn: 保密局人员，在二二八事件期间被郑介民派遣至台湾，负责组织忠义救国军别动队进行清乡行动。
description.en: An agent of the Secrecy Bureau dispatched to Taiwan by Zheng Jiemin during the February 28 Incident, responsible for organizing commando units of the Loyal and Righteous Army to carry out rural pacification campaigns.

description.zh-cn: 活跃于20世纪上半叶上海的秘密社会组织，其成员是忠义救国军的早期来源之一。
description.en: A secret society active in Shanghai during the first half of the 20th century, whose members were one of the early sources of recruits for the Loyal and Righteous Army.

description.zh-cn: 指中华民国政府有效统治中国大陆的时期，为忠义救国军效忠的国家实体。
description.en: Refers to the period when the government of the Republic of China effectively controlled mainland China, the state entity to which the Loyal and Righteous Army was loyal.

description.zh-cn: 戴笠创办了忠义救国军，该部队由其前身苏浙行动委员会别働队改组而来。
description.en: Dai Li founded the Loyal and Righteous Army, which was reorganized from its predecessor, the Commando Unit of the Suzhe Action Committee.

description.zh-cn: 戴笠是忠义救国军的著名指挥官，并兼任首任总指挥。
description.en: Dai Li was a famous commander of the Loyal and Righteous Army and also served as its first Commander-in-Chief.

description.zh-cn: 忠义救国军效忠于国民政府。
description.en: The Loyal and Righteous Army was loyal to the Nationalist Government.

description.zh-cn: 忠义救国军效忠于中国国民党。
description.en: The Loyal and Righteous Army was loyal to the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 忠义救国军是国民政府军事委员会下辖的部队。
description.en: The Loyal and Righteous Army was a unit under the Military Affairs Commission of the Nationalist Government.

relationships.source: 苏浙行动委员会别働队

description.zh-cn: 1938年5月，苏浙行动委员会别働队改名为国民政府军事委员会忠义救国军。
description.en: In May 1938, the Commando Unit of the Suzhe Action Committee was renamed the Loyal and Righteous Army of the Military Affairs Commission of the Nationalist Government.

description.zh-cn: 1946年1月21日，忠义救国军被改编为交通警察部队。
description.en: On January 21, 1946, the Loyal and Righteous Army was reorganized into the Traffic Police Corps.

description.zh-cn: 淞沪战役爆发后，蒋中正下令成立了苏浙行动委员会以组织敌后武装。
description.en: After the outbreak of the Battle of Shanghai, Chiang Kai-shek ordered the establishment of the Suzhe Action Committee to organize armed forces behind enemy lines.

description.zh-cn: 1937年9月4日，蒋中正电令在上海成立苏浙行动委员会。
description.en: On September 4, 1937, Chiang Kai-shek ordered the establishment of the Suzhe Action Committee in Shanghai via telegram.

relationships.target: 苏浙行动委员会别働队

description.zh-cn: 1937年9月底，戴笠成立了苏浙行动委员会别働队。
description.en: At the end of September 1937, Dai Li founded the Commando Unit of the Suzhe Action Committee.

description.zh-cn: 忠义救国军作为敌后游击部队参与了中国抗日战争。
description.en: The Loyal and Righteous Army participated in the Second Sino-Japanese War as a guerrilla force behind enemy lines.

description.zh-cn: 忠义救国军参与了第二次国共内战。
description.en: The Loyal and Righteous Army participated in the Second Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 1943年起，中美合作所为忠义救国军提供训练和美式装备，提升其战斗力。
description.en: Starting in 1943, the Sino-American Cooperative Organization provided training and American equipment to the Loyal and Righteous Army, enhancing its combat capabilities.

description.zh-cn: 1941年，忠义救国军与新四军第六师发生摩擦。
description.en: In 1941, the Loyal and Righteous Army had frictions with the New Fourth Army's 6th Division.

description.zh-cn: 在二二八事件后，忠义救国军的别动队在台湾执行了针对参与者的清乡和镇压行动。
description.en: Following the February 28 Incident, commando units of the Loyal and Righteous Army carried out rural pacification and suppression campaigns in Taiwan targeting participants.

description.zh-cn: 1947年3月8日，时任保密局局长郑介民派遣刘戈青前往台湾处理二二八事件相关事宜。
description.en: On March 8, 1947, Zheng Jiemin, then director of the Secrecy Bureau, dispatched Liu Geqing to Taiwan to handle matters related to the February 28 Incident.

description.zh-cn: 刘戈青抵达台湾后，召集人员组织了忠义救国军别动队以执行清乡任务。
description.en: After arriving in Taiwan, Liu Geqing gathered personnel to organize commando units of the Loyal and Righteous Army to carry out rural pacification tasks.

relationships.target: 国民政府军事委员会调查统计局

description.zh-cn: 刘戈青是保密局（军统）的人员。
description.en: Liu Geqing was an agent of the Secrecy Bureau (Juntong).

relationships.target: 国民政府军事委员会调查统计局

description.zh-cn: 郑介民是国民政府军事委员会调查统计局后续机构保密局的局长。
description.en: Zheng Jiemin was the director of the Secrecy Bureau, the successor organization to the Bureau of Investigation and Statistics of the Military Affairs Commission.

description.zh-cn: 忠义救国军（及其前身）的早期成员有许多来自杜月笙领导的青帮势力。
description.en: Many early members of the Loyal and Righteous Army (and its predecessor) came from the Green Gang forces led by Du Yuesheng.

description.zh-cn: 忠义救国军是中华民国大陆时期的一支军队。
description.en: The Loyal and Righteous Army was a military force during the period of the Republic of China on the mainland.
